articles.content: When Jarryd Hayne quit the NFL, everyone was left scratching their heads, but it can be revealed that it was events off the field that forced his hand.The shock announcement Jarryd Hayne was abandoni… [+6859 chars]
articles.description: The shock announcement Jarryd Hayne was abandoning his widely celebrated attempt to crack America’s National Football League came just days after police questioned him about a young woman’s claims she had been sexually assaulted.
articles.title: Hayne’s sudden exit followed police probe - Daily Telegraph
